name: Juzumaru Tsunetsugu
skill: Deals 921/1101 DMG to all enemies. Targets deal 54%/64% less DMG for a limited time.
ability: Moderately increases DMG dealt when one of the Five Swords Under Heaven is on the team.

additional_data.description: The spirit of one of the Five Swords under Heaven. She's a leading sword fighter with talent to match her blade's famous name. She adds double the polish to her skills so that no one can come close to copying her. She also becomes even more powerful when protecting something, possibly because her sword is said to have been used for self-defense. When seeking a companion for an escort mission, look no further.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Trade at Exchange for 75 Mochi 01/01/17 - 28/02/17
◦ The cost increases by 25 Mochi after each exchange
(75, 100, 125, 150, 175)

main: "I'll use every ounce of my strength to protect you!"
skill: "Through the blessing of the Buddha, no one shall be harmed!"
summon: "My name is Juzumaru Tsunetsugu. Pleased to meet you."
limit_break: "Now I can assist even more people in need of my protection."
